channel.title: Does anyone no how to fix these random errors?
channel.description:
Hi, on my server they will occur when the server is on, they all happen at different times, but here they are:
[code]Game saved for player maull ClientHandler: Client maull disconnected. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18953) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16362) at client.packetSending(client.java:16331) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:50) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player dds whip ddq ClientHandler: Client dds whip ddq disconnected.[/code]
I also get this error sometimes:
[code]java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedWriter.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at java.io.Writer.write(Unknown Source) at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:28609) at client.process(client.java:15959) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedWriter.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at java.io.Writer.write(Unknown Source) at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:28609) at client.process(client.java:15959) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedWriter.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at java.io.Writer.write(Unknown Source) at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:28609) at client.process(client.java:15959) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedWriter.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at java.io.Writer.write(Unknown Source) at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:28609) at client.process(client.java:15959) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedWriter.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at java.io.Writer.write(Unknown Source) at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:28609) at client.process(client.java:15959) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedWriter.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at java.io.Writer.write(Unknown Source) at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:28609) at client.process(client.java:15959) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedWriter.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at java.io.Writer.write(Unknown Source) at client.ConfirmTrade(client.java:28609) at client.process(client.java:15959) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50)[/code]
If anyone knows how to fix any of these errors, it would be very helpful
Thanks
Musicmad

item.title: Does anyone no how to fix these random errors?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi, on my server they will occur when the server is on, they all happen at different times, but here they are:

Game saved for player maull ClientHandler: Client maull disconnected. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18953) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16362) at client.packetSending(client.java:16331) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:50) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player dds whip ddq ClientHandler: Client dds whip ddq disconnected.

I also get this error sometimes:
